column1: bb Royal Organic - Poha, 2x1 kg Multipack
column4: About : Poha, also known as compressed rice or beaten rice, as the name recommends are flakes completed by flattening dehusked rice. These are rigid, bland-tasting, white grains that make softer and tend to swell up to twice their size when soaked in water. Avalakki considered strong because it doesnt include any cholesterol and saturated fat. With less sodium content, compressed rice is a strong choice of calorie. It is normally used for making breakfast dishes, which is always a strong choice and it is made from the rice which is grown organically.
